root.name: Hokuto no Ken: Violence Gekiga Adventure
root.description: Unlike most of the Hokuto No Ken games which were mostly side scrolling beat-em-ups, this was an adventure which was released in Japan around May 1986.StoryThe story only covers up to fighting Shin where the player has to locate the other Jacks to find Shin.GameplayThe game is centered around finding the thugs from Shin's army and taking them out. The big twist in the game is involving pressure points. The player can only kill the main enemies by finding and talking to the villagers to find out information about the enemies. If the knowledge is not known, the enemy cannot be defeated.
